article.title: Status and history for [ces]
article.para: See the Github repository for issues and changes in 2023 and after.

history.history-entry: U+0115 e LATIN SMALL LETTER E WITH BREVE replaced by U+011B e LATIN SMALL LETTER E WITH CARON, thanks to Denis Jacquerye.
many spelling mistakes corrected thanks to Zdeněk Wagner.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, complete XML contributed by Adobe Systems.
